label: 関東管領
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Shogunal deputy for the Kantō region. Official post created in Kamakura by the Muromachi bakufu to assist the members of the ruling Ashikaga family who served as governor generals of the Kantō region (kantō kubō). [関東公方]
